outputs.output_descr:
ART GOLD Albania project is part of UNDP ART Initiative (ARTiculation of territorial and thematic networks of human development cooperation), which is intended to promote, in the interested countries, national co-operation framework programs for governance and local development.
The project will operate in the context of the global ART Programme for promoting a national governance framework able to establish and strengthen horizontal partnerships with development stakeholders. The project will strive to strengthen planning and coordination at the local level, promote innovations, best practice and knowledge sharing, consolidate established Local Economic Development Agencies as well as facilitate partnerships with decentralized cooperation actors and networks to the benefit of national/sub-national priorities. 

The Projecte backbone is the promotion of strategic local planning and prioritization and development of partnerships that can be generated from the eventual engagement of decentralized cooperation actors by introducing these latter actors to the territorial development priorities and opportunities identified locally in Albania. 

The Project will be engaged in an intensive exercise of field assessments and consultations with various regional and local development stakeholders, active civil society organizations and individual entrepreneurships, covering most of the territory of Vlora and Shkodra regions to help them develop Strategic Plans for both regions.

project_descr: Regional Level Governance and Local Development  - Art Gold 2  (ARTiculation of territorial and thematic networks of human development cooperation)
